Content: Great . I will put you in touch with Satya .
Do you want to invest in Twitter take private ?
It's way beyond my resources . I presume you are not interested in venture $ .

There is plenty of financial support , but you're a friend , so just letting you know you'd get
priority . VC money is fine if you want .
Very cool ! OK - if I were to put together $ , what size could you make available ?
Whatever you'd like . I will just cut back others .
I would need to know the approximate by next week

What would be the largest $ that would be ok ? I consulted with our LPs , and I have strong
demand . Would be funl
Great . Probably doable - let me see .

Can be less if easier . The round is oversubscribed , so I just have to tell other investors what
their allocation is ideally by early next week .
Should I connect you with the Morgan Stanley team ?
Yes please . Especially with the terms , etc. I know Michael Grimes , btw .

Please feel free to call him directly
wwwwwwwwwww
OK- I'll do that . ( Trying to simplify your massively busy life . )
The Morgan Stanley deal team is truly excellent and I don't say such things lightly .
Indeed ! I took U public and the MSFT - LI deal with them !
